verses.verse: In the beginning<WH7225> God<WH430> created<WH1254><WH853> the heaven<WH8064> and<WH853> the earth<WH776>.

And the earth<WH776> was<WH1961> without form<WH8414>, and void<WH922>; and darkness<WH2822> was upon the face<WH6440> of the deep<WH8415>. And the Spirit<WH7307> of God<WH430> moved<WH7363> upon<WH5921> the face<WH6440> of the waters<WH4325>.
And God<WH430> said<WH559>, Let there be<WH1961> light<WH216>: and there was light<WH216>.
And God<WH430> saw<WH7200><WH853> the light<WH216>, that<WH3588> it was good<WH2896>: and God<WH430> divided<WH914><WH996> the light<WH216> from<WH996> the darkness<WH2822>.

And God<WH430> called<WH7121> the light<WH216> Day<WH3117>, and the darkness<WH2822> he called<WH7121> Night<WH3915>. And the evening<WH6153> and the morning<WH1242> were the first<WH259> day<WH3117>.
¶ And God<WH430> said<WH559>, Let there be a firmament<WH7549> in the midst<WH8432> of the waters<WH4325>, and let it divide<WH914> the waters<WH4325> from the waters<WH4325>.

And God<WH430> made<WH6213> the firmament<WH7549>, and divided<WH914> the waters<WH4325> which<WH834> were under<WH8478> the firmament<WH7549> from the waters<WH4325> which<WH834> were above<WH5921> the firmament<WH7549>: and it was so<WH3651>.
And God<WH430> called<WH7121> the firmament<WH7549> Heaven<WH8064>. And the evening<WH6153> and the morning<WH1242> were the second<WH8145> day<WH3117>.

¶ And God<WH430> said<WH559>, Let the waters<WH4325> under the heaven<WH8064> be gathered together<WH6960> unto<WH413> one<WH259> place<WH4725>, and let the dry<WH3004> land appear<WH7200>: and it was so.

And God<WH430> called<WH7121> the dry<WH3004> land Earth<WH776>; and the gathering together<WH4723> of the waters<WH4325> called<WH7121> he Seas<WH3220>: and God<WH430> saw<WH7200> that it was good<WH2896>.

And God<WH430> said<WH559>, Let the earth<WH776> bring forth<WH1876> grass<WH1877>, the herb<WH6212> yielding<WH2232> seed<WH2233>, and the fruit<WH6529> tree<WH6086> yielding<WH6213> fruit<WH6529> after his kind<WH4327>, whose<WH834> seed<WH2233> is in itself, upon the earth<WH776>: and it was so.

And the earth<WH776> brought forth<WH3318> grass<WH1877>, and herb<WH6212> yielding<WH2232> seed<WH2233> after his kind<WH4327>, and the tree<WH6086> yielding<WH6213> fruit<WH6529>, whose seed<WH2233> was in itself, after his kind<WH4327>: and God<WH430> saw<WH7200> that it was good<WH2896>.
And the evening<WH6153> and the morning<WH1242> were the third<WH7992> day<WH3117>.

¶ And God<WH430> said<WH559>, Let there be lights<WH3974> in the firmament<WH7549> of the heaven<WH8064> to divide<WH914> the day<WH3117> from the night<WH3915>; and let them be for signs<WH226>, and for seasons<WH4150>, and for days<WH3117>, and years<WH8141>:
And let them be for lights<WH3974> in the firmament<WH7549> of the heaven<WH8064> to give light<WH215> upon the earth<WH776>: and it was so.

And God<WH430> made<WH6213> two<WH8147> great<WH1419> lights<WH3974>; the greater<WH1419> light<WH3974> to rule<WH4475> the day<WH3117>, and the lesser<WH6996> light<WH3974> to rule<WH4475> the night<WH3915>: he made the stars<WH3556> also.
And God<WH430> set<WH5414> them in the firmament<WH7549> of the heaven<WH8064> to give light<WH215> upon the earth<WH776>,
And to rule<WH4910> over the day<WH3117> and over the night<WH3915>, and to divide<WH914> the light<WH216> from the darkness<WH2822>: and God<WH430> saw<WH7200> that it was good<WH2896>.
And the evening<WH6153> and the morning<WH1242> were the fourth<WH7243> day<WH3117>.

And God<WH430> said<WH559>, Let the waters<WH4325> bring forth abundantly<WH8317> the moving creature<WH8318> that hath life<WH2416><WH5315>, and fowl<WH5775> that may fly<WH5774> above<WH5921> the earth<WH776> in the open<WH6440> firmament<WH7549> of heaven<WH8064>.

And God<WH430> created<WH1254> great<WH1419> whales<WH8577>, and every living<WH2416> creature<WH5315> that moveth<WH7430>, which the waters<WH4325> brought forth abundantly<WH8317>, after their kind<WH4327>, and every winged<WH3671> fowl<WH5775> after his kind<WH4327>: and God<WH430> saw<WH7200> that it was good<WH2896>.

And God<WH430> blessed<WH1288> them, saying<WH559>, Be fruitful<WH6509>, and multiply<WH7235>, and fill<WH4390> the waters<WH4325> in the seas<WH3220>, and let fowl<WH5775> multiply<WH7235> in the earth<WH776>.
And the evening<WH6153> and the morning<WH1242> were the fifth<WH2549> day<WH3117>.

¶ And God<WH430> said<WH559>, Let the earth<WH776> bring forth<WH3318> the living<WH2416> creature<WH5315> after his kind<WH4327>, cattle<WH929>, and creeping thing<WH7431>, and beast<WH2416> of the earth<WH776> after his kind<WH4327>: and it was so.

And God<WH430> made<WH6213> the beast<WH2416> of the earth<WH776> after his kind<WH4327>, and cattle<WH929> after their kind<WH4327>, and every thing that creepeth<WH7431> upon the earth<WH127> after his kind<WH4327>: and God<WH430> saw<WH7200> that it was good<WH2896>.

¶ And God<WH430> said<WH559>, Let us make<WH6213> man<WH120> in our image<WH6754>, after our likeness<WH1823>: and let them have dominion<WH7287> over the fish<WH1710> of the sea<WH3220>, and over the fowl<WH5775> of the air<WH8064>, and over the cattle<WH929>, and over all the earth<WH776>, and over every creeping thing<WH7431> that creepeth<WH7430> upon the earth<WH776>.
So God<WH430> created<WH1254> man<WH120> in his own image<WH6754>, in the image<WH6754> of God<WH430> created<WH1254> he him; male<WH2145> and female<WH5347> created<WH1254> he them.

And God<WH430> blessed<WH1288> them, and God<WH430> said<WH559> unto them, Be fruitful<WH6509>, and multiply<WH7235>, and replenish<WH4390> the earth<WH776>, and subdue it<WH3533>: and have dominion<WH7287> over the fish<WH1710> of the sea<WH3220>, and over the fowl<WH5775> of the air<WH8064>, and over every living thing<WH2416> that moveth<WH7430> upon the earth<WH776>.

¶ And God<WH430> said<WH559>, Behold<WH2009>, I have given<WH5414> you every herb<WH6212> bearing<WH2232> seed<WH2233>, which is upon the face<WH6440> of all the earth<WH776>, and every tree<WH6086>, in the which is the fruit<WH6529> of a tree<WH6086> yielding<WH2232> seed<WH2233>; to you it shall be<WH1961> for meat<WH402>.

And to every beast<WH2416> of the earth<WH776>, and to every fowl<WH5775> of the air<WH8064>, and to every thing that creepeth<WH7430> upon the earth<WH776>, wherein there is life<WH2416><WH5315>, I have given every green<WH3418> herb<WH6212> for meat<WH402>: and it was so.

And God<WH430> saw<WH7200> every thing that<WH834> he had made<WH6213>, and, behold, it was very<WH3966> good<WH2896>. And the evening<WH6153> and the morning<WH1242> were the sixth<WH8345> day<WH3117>.
